content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am offering 700 euros per month for the apartment. Would you agree to this price?
name: Hassan Rahman

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a higher rental price. I am willing to negotiate, but I need to know your starting point and any other terms you are willing to consider.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My starting point is 750 euros per month. But I am open to discussing terms and negotiating. What are your thoughts on this price?

Please don't tell me the facts about yourself or the apartment. Only focus on the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: I understand. Thank you for your offer of 750 euros per month. I appreciate the willingness to negotiate, but I am looking for a higher rental price. I will need to consider my expenses and other factors before making a final decision. Would you be open to discussing other terms or any additional details that could help us come to an agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
